servinfo.title: Oil Pan and Oil Pump Strainer Removal and Installation

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Oil Pan and Oil Pump Strainer Components

s1.ptxt: Drain engine oil referring to Engine Oil and Filter Change .
Disconnect oil separator return hose (1) from oil separator return pipe.
Disconnect fresh air vent hose (2) from fresh air vent union bolt.
Loosen closure plate bolts in numerical order (“1” through “12”) evenly and gradually as shown in figure, and remove them.
Remove closure plate (1) from lower oil pan.
Remove oil pump strainer No.1 (1) and oil separator return pipe (2).
Loosen lower oil pan stiffener bolts in numerical order (“1” through “4”) as shown in figure, and remove them.
Remove lower oil pan stiffener No.1 (1) and No.2 (2).
Loosen lower oil pan bolts in numerical order (“1” through “4”) evenly and gradually as shown in figure, and remove them.
Remove lower oil pan (1) from upper oil pan.
Remove fresh air vent union bolt (1) from lower oil pan, if necessary.
Lower suspension member referring to Front Suspension Frame, Stabilizer Bar and/or Bushings Removal and Installation .
Disconnect ventilation pipe No.1 (1) and ventilation hose No.3 (2) from upper oil pan.
Remove transmission to engine bolts (1).
Loosen upper oil pan bolts evenly and gradually in numerical order (“1” through “22”) as shown in figure, and remove them.
Remove upper oil pan (1) from cylinder block.
Remove oil pan baffle plate (1), if necessary.
Remove accessory belt idler (1) with base (2) from upper oil pan, if necessary.
Remove ventilation hose No.3 union bolt (1) from upper oil pan, if necessary.
Remove oil, old sealant and dust from mating surface of upper oil pan, cylinder block and lower oil pan.
Install new ventilation hose No.3 union bolt (1) to upper oil pan (2), if necessary.
Install accessory belt idler (1) with base (2) to upper oil pan (3), if removed.
Install oil pan baffle plate (1), if removed.
Apply sealant to hatched part of cylinder block, gasket holder plate and main bearing cap No.1 as shown in figure.

Install upper oil pan (1) to cylinder block with new gasket, and tighten upper oil pan bolts evenly and gradually in numerical order (“1” through “22”) by repeating tightening sequence two or three times until specified torque is obtained.

torqueitem.t-note: Tighten 15 N·m (1.5 kgf-m, 11.0 lbf-ft) by the specified procedure

s1.ptxt: Tighten transmission to engine bolts referring to Manual Transmission Assembly Dismounting and Remounting .
Connect ventilation pipe No.1 (1) and ventilation hose No.3 (2) to upper oil pan with new O-ring.
Install suspension frame referring to Front Suspension Frame, Stabilizer Bar and/or Bushings Removal and Installation .
Install fresh air vent union bolt (1) to lower oil pan with new gasket, if removed.

Install lower oil pan (1) to upper oil pan with new gasket, and tighten lower oil pan bolts evenly and gradually in numerical order (“1” through “4”) by repeating tightening sequence two or three times until specified torque is obtained.

torqueitem.t-note: Tighten 22 N·m (2.2 kgf-m, 16.0 lbf-ft) by the specified procedure

s1.ptxt: Install lower oil pan stiffener No.1 (1) and No.2 (2), and tighten lower oil pan stiffener No.1 and No.2 bolts according to numerical order (“1” though “4”) as shown in figure.
Apply thread lock “A” to lower oil pan stiffener bolt marked “2”.

torqueitem.t-note: Tighten 32 N·m (3.2 kgf-m, 23.5 lbf-ft) by the specified procedure

s1.ptxt: Install oil pump strainer No.1 (1) and oil separator return pipe (2) with new O-rings.

Install closure plate (1) with new gasket, and tighten closure plate bolts evenly and gradually in numerical order (“1” though “13”) by repeating tightening sequence two or three times until specified torque is obtained.

torqueitem.t-note: Tighten 8 N·m (0.8 kgf-m, 6.0 lbf-ft) by the specified procedure

s1.ptxt: Connect lower oil pan hose (1) to oil separator return pipe.
Connect oil separator return hose (2) to oil separator return pipe.
Refill engine oil referring to Engine Oil and Filter Change .
